title: Windfolk Sky is just the Beginning
description: Eurian is a world at war. The Coalition seeks to control all the trydian, the priceless mineral that keeps the islands floating in the air. Esen, a soldier in the rebel forces, must face them to protect the planet and have her revenge. Windfolk is an intense action adventure where you can fly using your jetpack and battle against enemies to achieve victory. Moonscars

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950

game_info.Version: Build 9171240 | Full  + Win7 fix + Bonus Soundtrack
